General.Name: Narae Nanotech Corp.
General.Description: Narae Nanotech Corporation manufactures and sells industrial equipment in South Korea and internationally. It provides photolithography process systems; thin film manufacturing systems; OCR/OCA bonding and lamination systems; inkjet printers; and offset printers. The company was formerly known as Narae Corporation and changed its name to Narae Nanotech Corporation in September 2000. Narae Nanotech Corporation was founded in 1990 and is based in Yongin-si, South Korea.
